document_data.name: Ithimir Isle
document_data.mainbody: '''Ithimir Isle''' was a small island off the coast of [[Akanûl]]. The island was originally in [[Abeir]] and fell into the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] at the time of the [[Spellplague]].{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies|2594}} The island was notable for being the only source of [[arambarium]] ore in [[Faerûn]].{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies|504}}
